resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Allowing applications to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
When screen off, long-pressing the volume rockers will seek music tracks
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Volume keys control media volume rather than notifications
Pressing the volume rocker up/down will wake the device
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
When Privacy Guard is enabled, %s will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages, location or call logs.
When enabling Privacy Guard for the built-in app %s, the app will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages, location or call logs. This may cause other apps to misbehave.
Do not access personal data by default for newly-installed apps
Show notification if privacy guard is active.
Manage which apps have access to your personal data and other apps permissions
No apps with relevant permissions are installed

In this screen you can choose for which apps Privacy Guard should be active by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data, such as contacts, messages, location or call logs. Long pressing on an entry allows to set specifically app permissions.\n\nBy default built-in apps are not shown. If you want to show them or filter apps to show only the ones requesting access to personal data by their permissions, select the respective options in the menu.
Selected app does not request permissions which access personal data. Do you want to modify the other permissions?
Reset all permissions back to default?
This app has no changeable permissions.
Include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery and bootloader
Display a notification when USB debugging is connected
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back button
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Notification text animation in the statusbar
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Navigation bar height while in portrait
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side
Select and preview system toast animation
Change hosts file to disable ads
Updating hosts file failed. Please try again.
List of strings (part of URL\'s) that should be allowed by the ad blocker
Type string to add to whitelist
Double tap status bar or lock screen slider to put the device to sleep
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Show notifications from this app on the lockscreen
Never show ongoing notifications from this app on the lockscreen
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
Disable quick settings on secure lockscreen.
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Enable or disable the Google search bar in the recents menu
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"
Zipalign any unaligned apps on each boot
Fix permissions on apps and their data on each boot
Clear application cache files each boot
Speed up file systems at boot
It looks like init.d isn\'t setup properly. Please contact your ROM developer.
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Change the order of PIN pad numbers
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Don\'t show heads up in these applications
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
To allow applications to display interactive notifications in a pop-up window on your screen, enable Heads up.
Notification will show until it is dismissed
Hide notification on touch outside and on home button press
Do not hide notification after touch outside or on home button press
Swiping up on the heads up notification will snooze it for %d minutes
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Double tap anywhere on the navigation bar to force sleep
Show in battery statistics unaccounted and over-counted usage.
Must draw gesture to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock gesture
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Display the number of pending notifications
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Choose whether to dismiss all tasks or ignore the foreground task
Close the Quick Settings panel upon toggle
Restores user interface preferences to default values
Are you sure you want to reset your preferences?
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Two main tiles on the first row
Three or four tiles on each row
Enable advanced settings for location in quick settings
Show the weather in the status bar header
View or change how the \'cLock\' widget will display
View or change status bar weather settings
This will hide all force close notificaitons
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
You don\'t have any blacklisted numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To blacklist calls and/or messages from certain numbers, enable the blacklist.
Incoming calls and messages from phone numbers in the blacklist will be blocked
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Unable to add invalid number to blacklist
Do you want to remove this blacklist entry?

To get started tap the edit icon to unlock the navigation bar for editing.

You can tap an icon to change its shortcut, or long press an icon to re-arrange the layout.

Tap save to commit your changes, or restore to reset the layout to default settings.
Change and arrange navigation bar buttons
Delete current settings and restore the default layout?
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Edit and re-arrange navigation ring shortcuts

Tap the edit icon to open the navigation ring for editing.

Select a target to configure its behavior.

Tap the check mark icon to save your changes, or restore to reset the settings to defaults.
Top pie does not show status and clock information
Change the button icon color mode
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
Play a sound when connecting or disconnecting the charger
Display a custom greeting in the status bar after unlocking the device
Device is in Charging mode, USB debugging is disabled
Device is in Charging mode, USB debugging is disabled
Lets you disable all data and file transfer connection with computer and put device in charging only mode
Show notification when storage media is removed
Display ongoing notification for mounted storage
Tap an icon on the left or right to reassign a lock screen shortcut.
Allow to overwrite default value with user config
Trigger activation only on pending notifications
Use shake sensor value to trigger activation
Do you want to test shake sensor?
Configure shake strength required to trigger activation
Force showing time when there is no notification
Hide before %d seconds. Auto hide on touch outside
Ability to apply color alpha value and make notification shade transparent.
Display the bluetooth icon when it is enabled but not connected
Add and set the order of SlimActions for SlimAction tile
Long press lock icon to sleep
This option will not work if both smart lock and accessibility touch exploration are enabled
Force expanded notifications on all apps that support it
Do not reduce media playback volume when a notification arrives
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Set custom animations for system keyboard
Hide the IME switcher button on NavBar
Automatic light condition change mode is enabled. Manual switching is not possible.
Power menu in expanded status bar
ATTENTION: For devices with on-screen navigation bar, this enables navbar customizations. For devices with hardware navigation keys, it may require a reboot
Enable the layout changer keys and set the number of enabled layouts
navigation bar layouts are currently enabled
All 5 navigation bar layouts are currently enabled
Allow legacy menu key to replace layout switch when requested
Add a space to allow the side menu keys in the navigation bar.
Include a switch that changes the layout to keyboard arrows and the AOSP keyboard switcher
Not enough room in the layout: enable additional layouts or legacy menu keys
Rearrange by dragging by the handle on the right. Remove by swiping.
Enable long-press on home for the google now search assistant
Info: please select Gallery to save image
Customize navbar and select custom shortcuts and actions
Coose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Enable to colorize all icons, disable to colorize only the monochrome icons
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area.
The chamber of secrets has opened
Choose how scrollable objects look when they overshoot
Select the weight of the scrollable objects
Recent apps panel size in percent
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
